content.title: Tree Recognition Algorithm
content.description: Developed a highly accurate, real-time image recognition algorithm to identify tree canopies in the game RuneScape. This project served as an initial foray into image recognition. The algorithm successfully distinguishes tree canopies from other green elements in the game, highlighting them in real-time and providing clickable regions for interaction.

infoBoxes.title: Technology
infoBoxes.content: Python, Tkinter, PyAutoGUI, PIL, OpenCV, Git

infoBoxes.title: Recognition
infoBoxes.content: All tree canopies, Distinct from grass and players

infoBoxes.title: Features
infoBoxes.content: Real-time processing, Canopy highlighting, Clickable regions

items.text: Demonstration of the algorithm showing the game window and a duplicate window with highlighted tree canopies and their IDs, showcasing real-time tree recognition in RuneScape.
